CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT( Shipping_Method__c), "000001_CADS_D_3DS", "FedEx Economy® (3-5 business days)", "000001_CADS_P_PO", "FedEx Priority Overnight® (1-2 business days)", "000001_CADS_D_CX", "Canada Post XpresspostTM (3-5 business days)", "000001_CADS_P_CP", "Canada Post PriorityTM (1-2 business days)", "000001_CADS_D_P4", "Purolator Ground (3-5 business days)", "000001_CADS_P_P3", "Purolator Express (1-2 business days)", TEXT(Shipping_Method__c))
CustomField.label: Shipping Method Name
